titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Revenue Act of 1987 which imposed the diesel fuel and aviation fuel taxes at the wholesale level.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4333.

bill.summary: 3/17/1988--Introduced. Repeals provisions of the Revenue Act of 1987 that imposed excise tax on wholesale sales of diesel and aviation fuels. Provides that the Internal Revenue Code be applied and administered as if such provisions had not been enacted.
